meanings.definition: One of five children born at the same birth.
meanings.sent1: The hospital celebrated the birth of a quintuplet.
meanings.sent2: The quintuplet siblings played together in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplet giggled as they all tried to fit on the same swing.
meanings.sent4: The quintuplet of puppies wagged their tails in unison.
meanings.sent5: The family portrait featured the adorable quintuplet in matching outfits.

meanings.definition: A group or set of five similar things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount for buying a quintuplet of notebooks.
meanings.sent2: She collected a quintuplet of colorful seashells from the beach.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplet of cupcakes looked too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with a quintuplet of vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a quintuplet of trees in the landscape.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for five voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The choir performed a beautiful quintuplet at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra rehearsed a challenging quintuplet for the recital.
meanings.sent3: The quintuplet of violins added a magical touch to the symphony.
meanings.sent4: The band composed a lively quintuplet for the festival.
meanings.sent5: The quintuplet of singers harmonized perfectly on stage.
